content.description:
BEWARE THE PIKE! This is a real bad boy. You can identify by the pike shaped impression on the left of the route, and by the spike of doom below... Moderately easy; a few little slopey holds/ insecure crimps. Crux is a few committing moves leading to a scary and insecure topout. Avoid choss to left and right of route. rock is solid in the middle.

 BE ADVISED There is a broken wooden post threatening to impale any would-be senders who happen to fall far enough to land on it. Fr tho stick a crash pad on it (or chop it down :). Pro tip - go round and brush the top before topping out.
content.location: In Blue Elephant area (see Connor's Crack / Keaney's Wall for directions). From the crack, go around the north corner of the bluff until you come across a wall with a pike shaped impression on the wall, and a broken post in front of it. Route is on the right of the impression.

content.description:
Very fun highball! Start on face left of the crack for decent holds. Move up and right into crack. - V2 Go straight up the crack. - V3 Avoid the jutting forehead on the right. Finish up the top nose for a slightly sketchy highball topout ;)

 Rock is very secure here. Landing isn't the best. If you plan on topping out, go round n check out the top first.
content.location: This is in the NEW & developing Blue Elephant Area! From the entrance, travel allll the way down past the waterfall, past the bridge ruins, past the mushroom slab, until you come to an old concrete shelter ruin. The Blue Elephant area is past the shelter ruin, up the hill on the left. This crack is one of the first features you'll see on the left side of the east bluff. It's in front of the concrete pier blocks.

content.description:
This is a good ol' verticle line up the wall. it features a solid landing and some fun moves. a good route for a beginner trying to get out of their comfort zone. Top out!!!

 Start left with right hand on side pull and left hand on edge. Move right and up the line.

 Avoid choss on the left and ledge on the right.
content.protection: Pad(s) and a spotter. Landing area is a ledge.
content.location: In Blue Elephant area (see Connor's Crack / Keaney's Wall for directions). Its located on the west bluff right next to Pike.

content.description: Newest area and the furthest down the cliff band from the trail start. Features mainly highball cliff line problems.
